std_narrative.citation:
Harry, child of John Anderson Truman & Martha Ellen Young, died (age 88) on 26 December 1972 in Jackson County, Missouri, United States of America. '''DeathRegistration''': "Missouri Death Certificates, 1910 - 1974"
Missouri State Archives; Deceased: Harry S. Truman; Date of Death: December 26, 1972; County: Jackson
[https://www.sos.mo.gov/images/archives/deathcerts/1972/1972_00106612.PDF MO Death Certificate Image] (accessed 6 May 2021)
Spouse: Elizabeth Virginia Wallace; Father: John Anderson Truman; Mother: Martha Ellen Young; Age: 88; Certificate Number: 106612; Last Four SSN: 6969.
